DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized Phase III study to evaluate efficancy of weekly cisplatin or nedaplatin concurrent with Intensity-modulated radiation therapy in Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma (NPC).
DOC.brief_title: Weekly Cisplatin or Nedaplatin Concurrent With Intensity-modulated Radiation Therapy in Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma
